sourcesContent:
<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      categoryName: '',
      parentCategory: null,
    };
  },
  props: ['categories'],
  methods: {
    submitForm() {
      const newCategory = {
        name: this.categoryName,
        parent: this.parentCategory,
      };
      this.$emit('add-category', newCategory);
      this.categoryName = '';
      this.parentCategory = null;
    }
  }
};
</script>
